speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: How would you say the number thirty-three in French?

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Est-ce que vous avez de l'argent?
narrator_cue: Ask me if I have any money.

speaker: Female Speaker
text: Je peux vous donner de l'argent
narrator_cue: Say, "I can give you some money."

speaker: Male Speaker
text: Est-ce que vous avez des francs pour moi?
narrator_cue: Ask, "Have you any francs for me?"

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: What's the number fifty in French?

speaker: Female Speaker
text: En dollars, ce n'est pas cher

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: How do you ask, "Do you understand English?"

speaker: Female Speaker
narrator_cue: Do you remember how to say, "I speak French"?

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Here's how to say, "You speak too fast."

speaker: Female Speaker
text: En anglais, je ne parle pas vite
narrator_cue: Say, "In English, I don't talk fast."

speaker: Male Speaker
text: Mais en français, je ne vous comprends pas
narrator_cue: Say, "But in French, I don't understand you."

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Try to say, "When you speak French..."

speaker: Male Speaker
text: Vous parlez trop vite pour moi
narrator_cue: Say, "You talk too fast for me."

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Do you remember how to say "expensive"?

speaker: Male Speaker
narrator_cue: Tell me the wine is too expensive.
